aside.p: Introduce ability for players joining after the experiment has started. To do so, experimenters must specify a per-player maximum number of rounds as well as a per-experiment maximum. Players are added by the experimenter in the usual way. When the new players join after the experiment has begun, they wait in a lobby until a slot is available. Once a slot is available (the participant's new role is dynamically assigned as the role containing fewer players), the participant is automatically assigned to the next round.
Remove the unused rank field from the player table.
Perform an audit of using sqlite3_column_int instead of sqlite3_column_int64, and make sure that all return values of int64_t are properly checked and cast.
